import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; import '../../Containers/Terminal/Terminal.css' const About = () =>{ return(

About the project

Bored Panda Adventures - BPA is created for the people who never settle down.

Having a Bored Panda NFT gives you exclusive rights to organise and participate in epic adventures across all continents. If you are dreaming of exploring the natural wonders and live unique experiences hosted by like-minded people, all you have to do is join the club by owning a BPA NFT. BPA club will get you privilidged access to one of a kind events which make escape from your day-to-day life by experiencing immersive activities whcih will be remembered forever. The main purpose of the community is to connect like-minded people who never stop exploring, like adrenaline and think outside the box.

Here are a few of our characteristics:

{getTechnologies()}
); } const getTechnologies = () =>{ return
  1. Accept challenges
  2. Learn from mistakes
  3. Support innovation
  4. Help each other
  5. Grow outside comfort zone
  6. Strive to be the best
  7. Be brave to take risk
  8. Build your future
} export default About;
